Traits.Name: Evasive Maneuvering
Traits.Content: The Turnstile Gnasher has advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects it can see, such as spells.

Traits.Name: Hesitation Inducement
Traits.Content: Any creature that attempts to use an action to search for an item within 30 ft. of the creature must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or be unable to complete their action and be frightened until the end of their next turn.

Traits.Name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
Traits.Content: If the creature fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Turnstile Gnasher makes two attacks with Metal Jaws and one attack with Grasping Turnstile.

Actions.Name: Metal Jaws
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +14 to hit, dealing 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage. A creature hit by this attack must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn, as it senses a dreadful inevitability.

Actions.Name: Grasping Turnstile
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +14 to hit, dealing 22 (3d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage. The creature must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or be grappled by the Turnstile Gnasher until the grapple ends, taking 10 (3d6) additional bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns.

Actions.Name: Crowd Surge
Actions.Content: The Turnstile Gnasher creates an area of chaotic movement in a 30-foot cone. Each creature within range must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 44 (8d10) slashing damage from whirling metal edges and be pushed back 10 feet. On a success, a creature takes half damage and is not pushed.

LegendaryActions.Name: Hesitation Riposte (Costs 1 Action)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Turnstile Gnasher can use its reaction to force one creature that took an action to search for an item within 30 ft. of it to make a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, that creature is paralyzed until the end of its next turn as they are caught in a phantom embrace.

LegendaryActions.Name: Converging Turnstiles (Costs 2 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Turnstile Gnasher can use Crowd Surge.

LegendaryActions.Name: Phantom Bite (Costs 3 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Turnstile Gnasher unleashes a flurry of ghostly bites. Each creature in a 15-foot radius must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or take 44 (8d10) necrotic damage and suffer the 'bruised' condition, giving disadvantage on their next attack roll. A successful save results in half damage and no condition.
